channel.title: Cheap & Reliable Web Hosting Designed For Server Masters
channel.description:
Introducing The New Service From [url=http://www.brenzscape.co.uk]The Brenzscape Gaming Network[/url].
Moparhoster has been specifically set up for Server Masters who want to move away from free forum hosts who litter your forums with adverts and long sub domains.
Moparhoster allows you to do what you want with your website, you could even put ads on yourself but YOU get the revenue.
.info domains are now as little as 99p (GBP) and our low cost packages are perfect.
And noting looks better than your own designed website and mabye a fully customisable forum on YOUR domain.
Please visit our website at http://www.moparhoster.co.uk
Thanks Brendan

item.title: Cheap & Reliable Web Hosting Designed For Server Masters
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

One problem, you can buy a .info domain for less then a buck at go daddy.

Get someone to host your server 24/7, or get a 110mb.com with no ad’s for free, 110mb free space and you can put ad’s on and you’ll get the money.
